short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds lineup slot indicators in the NFBC lineup page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhancements include adding visual indicators in the Set Lineup page that show whether each hitter is in their real-life team's lineup, and if so, which slot.

Lineup indicators correspond to data from the current day:
Green number: player's slot in starting lineup
Red x: player is out of starting lineup
Gray u: lineup is unreleased
No game: the player does not play today
